mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_files (trip_id, file_name, file_path, content_type, file_type, sequence) VALUES (#{tripId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{contentType}, #{fileType}, #{seq})
mapper.select: SELECT file_id, trip_id, file_name, file_path, content_type, file_type FROM trip_files WHERE trip_id = #{tripId} AND file_type = 'COVER'
SELECT file_id, trip_id, file_name, file_path, content_type, file_type FROM trip_files WHERE trip_id = #{tripId} AND file_type = 'NORMAL'
